mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (tel, userName, nickName, realName, avatarUrl, createTime) SELECT #{tel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avatarUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM user WHERE tel = #{tel})
mapper.select: SELECT userId, tel, nickName, realName, pwd, avatarUrl, createTime FROM user WHERE tel = #{tel}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_location (userId, etp, eid, longitude, latitude, createTime) SELECT #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{etp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{longitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{latitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM user_location WHERE eid = #{eid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND etp = #{etp,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND createTime > DATE_SUB(#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, INTERVAL 2 HOUR))
